content:
Dear [Customer Name],

Thank you for your email and feedback regarding the app. We are glad to hear that most of the issues have been resolved and the app is functioning smoothly. We appreciate your acknowledgement of our team's efforts.

Regarding the support period, we understand your concerns and will take note of your feedback for future projects. However, please note that our standard practice is to begin the support period upon delivery of the app, code, and documentation.

Regarding the issues you have raised:

1. We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Our team has reviewed and fixed the issue. The app will now only display products that are available in the stock.
2. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We have reviewed and made necessary changes. Please note that the search and filter is for category name only and not for the product.
3. We are glad to hear that the banners are working now. Our team has also fixed the issue with the links in the backend app image section.
4. Our team has reviewed and fixed the issue. The cart will now function correctly even if the client is not logged in.
5. Thank you for pointing this out. We have made the necessary changes to update the label from "أستمارة التواصل" to "نموذج التواصل".
6. Our team has reviewed and fixed the small gray space issue on top of every screen.

Thank you for your patience and understanding. Please note that the support period has started from 16-2-2023.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
